name: TTS Quality (MOS)
description: Mean Opinion Score evaluation specifically for Text-to-Speech quality, including naturalness, prosody, and intelligibility.
test_method: Synthesize standardized text passages. Human raters evaluate naturalness, intelligibility, and prosody on 1-5 scale following ITU standards.
notes: TTS quality evaluation requires diverse test sentences covering phonetic phenomena. Should evaluate with native speakers for each language.
